articles.title: Delegation of Veteran Officials of Chongryon Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Veteran Officials of Chongryon Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of veteran officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Pak Jong Sang, adviser to the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round the historic relics preserved there.
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 The President saved Koreans in Japan from the fate of statelessness and put forward them as overseas citizens of an independent and sovereign state. 
					
					 I can never forget the loving care shown by the President for the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
					
					 The great revolutionary life of the President and his immortal feats will be conveyed to posterity.
					
					 We will hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and devote ourselves to ushering in a new heyday of Chongryon, true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The delegation also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Mirim Riding Club and other places.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Park to Be Built in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Park to Be Built in Syria
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Park is to be built in Syria.
					In profound reverence for President Kim Il Sung who provided a firm foundation for friendship between the two countries with Hafez Al-Assad, former president of Syria, and extended material aid and moral support to the just cause of the Syrian people, the Damascus Provincial Office decided to name the park to be built in Kim Il Sung Street, Kafar Sussa District, Damascus after Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The decision was adopted at the 25th meeting of the Executive Council of the Provincial Office with unanimous approval on May 18.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed 
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 29th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Historical Experience of Building the Workers' Party of Korea".
					 The work makes perfect clarifications of theoretical and practical issues which would serve as the guidelines for the party building and activities ranging from the revolutionary character of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the basic principles of party building to the matters of the ideological, organizational and leadership art building of the party.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article devoted to this day says:
					
					 The nearly 30 years since the publication of the work have witnessed significant days when there was a heyday in the building of a revolutionary party of Juche type under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The original idea and theory on party building set forth by Kim Il Sung have served as life-giving water which helped the WPK develop into a revolutionary party of Juche strong in its independent stand despite any storm and a genuine mother party which takes care of the destiny of the popular masses in a responsible manner, and a basic source which enabled it to successfully perform its mission and role as the tested staff of the Juche revolution at all times.
					
					 The WPK could firmly defend the lineage of Juche and further develop into the ideologically pure and indestructible entity and an integral organization despite grim ordeals in the 1990s. This was ascribable to the energetic guidance of Kim Jong Il who creditably inherited the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The undisputable dignity of the WPK is being more fully demonstrated under the outstanding and tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man.
					
					 The WPK will demonstrate before the whole world its dignity and might as the indestructible revolutionary party in the future, too, as there are the immortal party building feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their rich experience and the tested leadership of Kim Jong Un who is steadily developing them in depth.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Has No Face to Talk about "Dialogue": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Has No Face to Talk about "Dialogue": Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- "Dialogue" much touted by the south Korean puppet regime is no more than a crafty trick to cover up the crimes it perpetrated against the nation by pushing the north-south relations to an extreme pitch of tension through its moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and shift the blame for the escalated tension on to it, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 The puppet regime is the hordes of confrontation maniacs who deliberately laid a stumbling block in the way for the north-south dialogue by perpetrating hideous provocations against the DPRK and unhesitatingly scuppered the opportunity for mending the north-south relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet regime has gone mad in its treacherous bid to achieve "unification of social systems," while malignantly hurting the inviolable dignity and social system of the DPRK. It is, indeed, a mockery and insult to all Koreans for it to trumpet about "dialogue." 
					
					 The puppet regime has neither face nor qualifications to talk about "dialogue".
					
					 It is, indeed, ridiculous for the regime to try to evade the responsibility for the worsened north-south relations by employing such poor gimmick. 
					
					 Towering high at present is the indignation of south Koreans from all walks of life at the puppet regime which has thrown the north-south relations and the whole society of south Korea into crises by enforcing policy of confrontation with the DPRK and misrule.
					
					 The puppet ruling forces' racket for confrontation with the DPRK will only worsen their ruling crisis and precipitate their final ruin, cursed and censured by all Koreans.
					
					 It is too late for them to improve their miserable lot already sealed through desperate tongue-lashing.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Authorities' False Propaganda
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Authorities' False Propaganda
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet forces let News 1 air a false report that the "north conceals" the news of its patrol ship and fishing boat's collision with a Russian submarine in the waters off Chongjin in July last year.
					 The tricksters cited the ghost-like existence of the "Chongjin Fishermen's Cooperative" and "Patrol Ship No. 679" and even let loose a spate of vituperations that the north "forced" the survivors to settle in other area to keep it secret.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said misinformation was a deliberate and premeditated provocation made by those tricksters and liars.
					
					 The puppet media again aired false report about the "collision", pursuant to the scenario and prodding of the Park Geun Hye regime working hard with bloodshot eyes to attain its sinister purpose through anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 It is the sinister scenario of the Park regime to provide misinformation fabricated in its backroom to reptile media and build up public opinion critical of the DPRK in a bid to shake the single-minded unity of its service personnel and people and bar it from building a thriving socialist nation and thus realize the dream of "unification of social systems."
					
					 The puppet regime is seeking to get something through false propaganda but it is no more than a foolish daydream of idiots.
					
					 There is no room on the earth for those who challenge the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the DPRK, no matter who they are.
					
					 Those who are bribed for a smear campaign to hurt the fellow countrymen, oblivious of the sacred duty of media, deserve merciless punishment, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms CIA Center for Hunting Human Beings
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms CIA Center for Hunting Human Beings
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. magazine Foreign Policy said the CIA, the basic mission of which remains intelligence gathering in name only, has undergone a dramatic change in its nature from an intelligence institution to the man-hunting machine while playing the role of an advance party in the "counter-terrorism." 
					 Minju Joson Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The magazine's comment on CIA's criminal nature is enough to stun the world.
					
					 What is noteworthy is that the CIA's criminal nature as a man-killing machine was evident from the day the CIA came into being.
					
					 Only U.S. presidents have had the right to control and operate the CIA since its establishment.
					
					 In the final analysis, U.S. presidents have been behind the CIA when it has committed all kinds of crimes not only inside the U.S. mainland but in different parts of the world. And the CIA's wrongdoings are directly linked with them.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that not only the CIA but also many intelligence organs of the U.S. made no scruple of committing all kinds of crimes in different parts of the world in a bid to realize its ambition to dominate the world. 
					
					 The U.S. foreign policy is of aggressive nature and the U.S. history of aggression is dotted with heinous crimes such as human rights abuses most of which remains unknown to the world. This is because it is relying on such the intelligence organs as the CIA.
					
					 The CIA is, therefore, an icon of the U.S., empire of evil, and its miniature as the worst criminal state in the world.

articles.title: Lifting of Confrontational Step and Fascist Law Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lifting of Confrontational Step and Fascist Law Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a Thursday rally on May 28, urging the regime to lift the "May 24 step" aimed at escalating confrontation with the DPRK and repeal the fascist "Security Law".
					 Speakers there deplored that north-south exchange and cooperation have been blocked since the "step" was taken by the regime.
					
					 Economy of south Korea suffered tremendous losses, more than 1 500 businesses went bankrupt and tour of Mt. Kumgang was totally banned due to the "step", they said.
					
					 Noting the "north policy" of the Lee Myung Bak "government" was harmful to the interests of all Koreans, they blamed Park Geun Hye regime for carrying forward it.
					
					 They urged the Park regime to lift the step in order to head for north-south exchange and reconciliation.
					
					 They censured the regime for suppressing the people who call for justice by invoking the "Security Law" in a bid to stay in power.
					
					 Terming the law an evil law encroaching upon the conscience and freedom of expression, they said democracy and human rights are unthinkable unless the law is repealed.

articles.title: Puppet Intelligence Service of S. Korea Censured for Its Illegal Acts
articles.content:
Puppet Intelligence Service of S. Korea Censured for Its Illegal Acts 
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- An editorial censuring the puppet Intelligence Service of south Korea keen on illegal acts was posted on Voice of People, a south Korean internet paper, on May 28.
					 Truth behind illegal political operations conducted by the IS in all fabrics of south Korean society is being disclosed one after another, the editorial said.
					
					 It has been opened to public by media that Won Se Hun, the former director of the IS, during his tenure of office met a conservative education inspector and instructed him to guard against members of the Teachers Union as part of the operation to outlaw the union, an illegal interference in the labor movement, the editorial noted, adding:
					
					 Won also issued a series of instructions to eliminate the forces critical of the regime after intentionally branding them as "left-wing forces following the north."
					
					 The present director of the IS asserted that it is impossible to talk about "north policy" as long as "followers of the north" are allowed to go scot-free, the editorial noted, adding:  His contention is not different from Won's idea.
					
					 It was disclosed that the IS had stretched out its tentacles even to judicial organs. The IS should be held accountable for its illegal acts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Organization on Its Website 
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher in a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Korean residents in Japan on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Chongryon's founding was posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on May 26.
					 The letter published on May 25, Juche 104 (2015) clarifies that Chongryon, which President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il formed and led, has traveled over the past six decades a glorious road of development and performed great exploits for the motherland and the nation.
					
					 It also indicates tasks for bringing about a new turn in the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Benin
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Observed in Benin
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was inaugurated in Cotonou on May 25.
					 Ali Houdou was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the party-building and the cause of Korea's reunification and hold political and cultural events including joint meeting and film show on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Beninese Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Beninese Personages
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Beninese personages praised the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il at the inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea held in Cotonou on May 25.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said HE Kim Jong Il made great contributions to the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, adding thanks to his patriotic bold decision a north-south summit was held and the June 15 joint declaration was adopted.
					
					 The eye-opening events that took place on the Korean peninsula in the wake of the publication of the declaration eloquently proved that the reunification of Korea is quite possible, he said, introducing the events in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The vice-president of the party said Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a political body guiding the Songun revolution.
					
					 He also trained the service personnel and people to be the ones strong in mental power, thus enabling them to bring about epoch-making changes and miracles in the drive for building a thriving country, the vice-president noted.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman Posted by Nigerian, Brazilian Bodies on Their Websites
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK FM Spokesman Posted by Nigerian, Brazilian Bodies on Their Websites 
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on May 21 and 22 posted on their websites the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in denunciation of the reckless remarks of the U.S. secretary of State.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX de RPDC advierte a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que EE.UU. se desespera para evadir la responsabilidad del fracaso total de su politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC publico el dia 30 una declaracion como sigue:
					En la reciente reunion consultiva tripartita EE.UU.-Japon- Sur de Corea, el imperio intento desviar la opinion publica tergiversando la verdad como si la RPDC negara el dialogo aunque ellos lo desean.
					
					Como es conocido por todos, desde hace mucho tiempo la RPDC ha venido insistiendo en la reanudacion del dialogo sin la premisa y esforzandose con sinceridad por realizarlo, pero EE.UU. lo impidio presentando las injustas "condiciones previas" de diversos tipos.
					
					Siempre declaramos que nuestra capacidad de autodefensa nacional centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares, nunca es un medio de amenaza a nadie ni objeto de negociacion.
					
					Nuestras armas nucleares son el disuasivo autodefensivo para enfrentar a la permanente amenaza nuclear y agresion militar de EE.UU., y la justa fuerza de castigo para rechazar rotundamente la agresion de los enemigos y asestarles la venganza implacable en el caso de estallar la guerra.
					
					Como ya se comprobo por la historia, fortalecer nuestra fuerza de autodefensa nacional y lograr el equilibrio del poder son el unico remedio para impedir la guerra entre la RPDC y EE.UU. que no tienen siquiera la confianza basica sino la arraigada desconfianza y hostilidad entre si.
					
					Es precisamente la grave provocacion acusar de "provocacion" la justa medida autodefensiva tomada por un pais pequeno para defender a si mismo desde el caudillo de agresion y guerra.
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer correctamente que el fracaso de su politica sobre la RPDC fue motivado por su erroneo punto de vista sobre ella.
					
					El punto de vista de EE.UU. que calumnia sin consideracion cualquier hecho de la RPDC llevo finalmente al fracaso las relaciones con la RPDC y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y ahora ha traido el resultado actual.
					
					Si EE.UU. no saca lecciones, aunque sea ahora, la consecuencia sera mas tragica.
